title: Aaron Rodgers talks about the transition from Davante Adams to Allen Lazard
description:
Julio Jones discussing pairing up with Tom Brady on the Buccaneers, Tua Tagovailoa embraces the love he's received from Tyreek Hill, and live reports from Sal Pal, Ed Werder, and Kimberley Martin at Eagles, Cowboys, and Browns camp. Plus injury updates from Adam Schefter throughout the show,

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Training camp begins this week with every team reporting to camp
